messages.title: VOTE FOR WHAT YOU BELIEVE IN
messages.content: Imagine a political system that puts the public first. Imagine an economy that gives everyone their fair share. Imagine a society capable of supporting everyone's needs. Imagine a planet protected from the threat of climate change now and for the generations to come.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for a publicly funded, publicly provided health service free at the point of use.
End austerity and restore the public sector and create one million good jobs that pay a living wage.
Abolish the cruel and unfair bedroom tax. Build 500,000 social rented homes by 2020 and bring empty homes back into use to ensure everyone has access to an affordable place to live.
Take serious action on climate change by working with other countries to ensure global temperatures do not rise beyond 2 degrees.
Scrap university tuition fees. Promote a comprehensive overhaul of local schools teaching staffed by qualified teachers. Bring Academies and Free Schools into the Local Authority system.
Return the railways to public hands to stop profits being put before passengers. Introduce an immediate cut in fares of 10% to give passengers a much-needed financial break.

issues.economy: End austerity and restore the public sector and create one million good jobs that pay a living wage.
issues.education: Scrap university tuition fees. Promote a comprehensive overhaul of local schools teaching staffed by qualified teachers. Bring Academies and Free Schools into the Local Authority system.
issues.environment: Take serious action on climate change by working with other countries to ensure global temperatures do not rise beyond 2 degrees.
issues.health: Fight for a publicly funded, publicly provided health service free at the point of use.
issues.socialWelfare: Abolish the cruel and unfair bedroom tax.

housing.content: Build 500,000 social rented homes by 2020 and bring empty homes back into use.

leaflet.additionalNotes: ABOUT THIS PUBLICATION: This flyer has not been paid for by big business or corporate interests, but has been supported instead by thousands of individual people donating 10 pounds or 5 pounds per month (Free Paper, Free Post by Royal Mail). It is printed on recycled paper free from chlorine.
